a=java.getElement('div#htmlContent||div#nr1') if(/\}\s*getPageData\(\);/.test(result)) { data=java.getElement('#subFrom@children').toArray().map(x=>x.attr('name')+'='+x.attr('value')).join('&') nurl=`${java.getString('text.首页.0@href')}/get-page-data?${Math.random()},{ "body": "${data}", "headers": { "X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest", "Referer": "${baseUrl}" }, "method": "POST" }` data=JSON.parse(java.ajax(nurl)) if(data.status == 1){ if(data.data!=''){ a.select('#contentTip').after('⋄'+data.data+'⋄'); } } } a.select('p.hid-pages,p#contentTip').remove() a##

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var url = source.getKey() + '/modules/article/search.php';
var headers = {};
var key = java.get('sokey');
var data = 'searchkey=' + java.encodeURI(key, 'GBK') + '&searchtype=all';
java.log("post前：" + url);
var res = java.post(url, data, headers);
java.log("post后：" + res.statusCode());
if (302 == res.statusCode()) {
    var location = String(res.headers().Location).replace(/^https:\/\/www.69shu.com(?=\/)/, source.getKey());
    var res = java.get(location, headers);
    if (res.statusCode() != 200) {
        location = String(res.headers().Location).replace(/^https:\/\/www.69shu.com(?=\/)/, source.getKey());
        res = java.get(location, headers);
    }
    var doc = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(res.bodyStream(), 'GBK', location);
    java.setContent(doc.html(), location)
} else {
    java.setContent(res.body(), url);
    res.body();
}
</js>

@js:
function sign(list) {
    var sb = 'amdryvsj9wpjntgs';
    list = list.sort();
    for (var i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        if (i == 0) {
            sb += list[i];
        } else {
            sb += "&";
            sb += list[i];
        }
    }
    sb += "6b4n1zqka1vs89c092j0aovgnpbn7rgi";
    return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase();
}
time = Math.round(new Date() / 1000);
list = ["product=1", "ver=3.0.0", "marketChannel=xiaomi", "sysVer=10", "book_id=" + java.get('bid'), "token=", "scroll_type=1","appId=", "osType=2", "time="+time, "packageName=com.yanyugelook.app", "chapter_id=" + result[0], "udid=e0448a41-f553-3de2-b2b8-7c271d060c66"];
body = {
	"product": "1",
	"ver": "3.0.0",
	"marketChannel": "xiaomi",
	"sign": sign(list),
	"sysVer": "10",
	"book_id": String(java.get('bid')),
	"token": "",
	"scroll_type": "1",
	"appId": "",
	"osType": "2",
	"time": time,
	"packageName": "com.yanyugelook.app",
	"chapter_id": String(result[0]),
	"udid": "e0448a41-f553-3de2-b2b8-7c271d060c66"
};
option = {
    "method": "POST",
    "body": JSON.stringify(body)
};
"/chapter/new-catalog," + JSON.stringify(option);
